üêç Parte 2: O Backend (API Python)

Este script coleta os dados do PC e cria uma p√°gina web leve (JSON) que o ESP32 consegue ler. Salve como stats_server.py:

import psutil
import time
from flask import Flask, jsonify

app = Flask(__name__)

@app.route('/stats')
def get_stats():
    # Coleta uso de cada n√∫cleo (amostragem de 1 segundo)
    cpu_cores = psutil.cpu_percent(interval=1, percpu=True) 
    ram = psutil.virtual_memory()
    disk = psutil.disk_usage('/')
    
    # Coleta Temperatura
    temp = 0
    try:
        t = psutil.sensors_temperatures()
        if 'coretemp' in t: temp = int(t['coretemp'][0].current)
        elif 'cpu_thermal' in t: temp = int(t['cpu_thermal'][0].current)
    except: pass

    return jsonify({
        "hostname": "UBUNTU-SERVER",
        "cpu_cores": cpu_cores,
        "temp": temp,
        "ram_pct": int(ram.percent),
        "ram_used": round(ram.used / (1024**3), 2),
        "ram_total": round(ram.total / (1024**3), 2),
        "disk_pct": int(disk.percent),
        "disk_used": round(disk.used / (1024**3), 1),
        "disk_total": round(disk.total / (1024**3), 1)
    })

if __name__ == '__main__':
    app.run(host='0.0.0.0', port=5000)

class LGFX_UICPAL : public lgfx::LGFX_Device {
  lgfx::Panel_ILI9341 _panel_instance;
  lgfx::Bus_SPI _bus_instance;
public:
  LGFX_UICPAL(void) {
    {

      _panel_instance.setBus(&_bus_instance); 
    }
    { 
      auto cfg = _panel_instance.config(); 
      cfg.pin_cs = 14; 
      cfg.pin_rst = 21; 
      cfg.panel_width = 240; 
      cfg.panel_height = 320; 
      _panel_instance.config(cfg); 
    }
    setPanel(&_panel_instance);
  }
};

LGFX_UICPAL lcd;
LGFX_Sprite canvas(&lcd);

// --- DADOS SENS√çVEIS (ALTERE AQUI) ---
const char* ssid = "NOME_DA_SUA_REDE";
const char* password = "SUA_SENHA_WIFI";
const char* serverUrl = "http://192.168.X.X:5000/stats";

// Configura√ß√£o de Hora (Brasil - UTC-3)
const char* ntpServer = "a.st1.ntp.br";
const long  gmtOffset_sec = -10800;
const int   daylightOffset_sec = 0;

int currentScreen = 0;
const int totalScreens = 4;

// Vari√°veis Globais de Dados
int core_loads[12], num_cores = 0;
int g_ram_pct, g_disk_pct, g_temp;
float r_used, r_total, d_used, d_total;
String g_host;

void fetchData() {
    if (WiFi.status() == WL_CONNECTED) {
        HTTPClient http;
        http.begin(serverUrl);
        http.setTimeout(4000);
        if (http.GET() == 200) {
            DynamicJsonDocument doc(4096);
            deserializeJson(doc, http.getString());
            g_host = doc["hostname"] | "SERVER";
            g_temp = doc["temp"] | 0;
            JsonArray cores = doc["cpu_cores"];
            num_cores = cores.size();
            for(int i=0; i < num_cores && i < 12; i++) core_loads[i] = cores[i];
            g_ram_pct = doc["ram_pct"] | 0;
            r_used = doc["ram_used"] | 0.0; r_total = doc["ram_total"] | 0.0;
            g_disk_pct = doc["disk_pct"] | 0;
            d_used = doc["disk_used"] | 0.0; d_total = doc["disk_total"] | 0.0;
        }
        http.end();
    }
}

void drawUI() {
    canvas.fillScreen(TFT_BLACK);
    
    // Header fixo
    canvas.setTextColor(TFT_CYAN); canvas.setTextSize(2);
    canvas.setCursor(10, 10); canvas.print(g_host);
    canvas.setTextColor(g_temp > 65 ? TFT_RED : TFT_GREEN);
    canvas.setCursor(240, 10); canvas.printf("%dC", g_temp);
    canvas.drawFastHLine(0, 35, 320, TFT_WHITE);

    canvas.setTextColor(TFT_YELLOW); canvas.setTextSize(2);

    if (currentScreen == 3) { // --- TELA: DATA E HORA ---
        struct tm timeinfo;
        if(!getLocalTime(&timeinfo)){
            canvas.drawCenterString("Erro ao obter hora", 160, 100);
        } else {
            canvas.drawCenterString("-- DATA E HORA --", 160, 50);
            canvas.setTextColor(TFT_WHITE);
            canvas.setTextSize(5);
            char timeHour[9];
            strftime(timeHour, 9, "%H:%M:%S", &timeinfo);
            canvas.drawCenterString(timeHour, 160, 100);
            
            canvas.setTextSize(2);
            canvas.setTextColor(TFT_CYAN);
            char timeDate[20];
            strftime(timeDate, 20, "%d/%m/%Y", &timeinfo);
            canvas.drawCenterString(timeDate, 160, 160);
            
            char timeDay[20];
            strftime(timeDay, 20, "%A", &timeinfo);
            canvas.drawCenterString(timeDay, 160, 190);
        }
    } 
    else if (currentScreen == 0) { // N√öCLEOS
        canvas.drawCenterString("-- CORES CPU --", 160, 45);
        for(int i=0; i 210) break;
            canvas.setTextColor(TFT_WHITE); canvas.setTextSize(1);
            canvas.setCursor(10, yPos + 3); canvas.printf("C%d", i);
            canvas.drawRect(35, yPos, 230, 12, TFT_DARKGREY);
            canvas.fillRect(37, yPos+2, map(core_loads[i],0,100,0,226), 8, (core_loads[i] > 80 ? TFT_RED : TFT_GREEN));
        }
    } 
    else if (currentScreen == 1) { // RAM
        canvas.drawCenterString("-- MEMORIA RAM --", 160, 50);
        canvas.setTextColor(TFT_WHITE);
        canvas.setCursor(20, 100); canvas.printf("Uso: %d%%", g_ram_pct);
        canvas.setCursor(20, 140); canvas.printf("Usado: %.2f GB", r_used);
        canvas.setCursor(20, 180); canvas.printf("Total: %.2f GB", r_total);
    }
    else if (currentScreen == 2) { // DISCO
        canvas.drawCenterString("-- DISCO --", 160, 50);
        canvas.setTextColor(TFT_WHITE);
        canvas.setCursor(20, 100); canvas.printf("Uso: %d%%", g_disk_pct);
        canvas.setCursor(20, 140); canvas.printf("Usado: %.1f GB", d_used);
        canvas.setCursor(20, 180); canvas.printf("Total: %.1f GB", d_total);
    }

    // Navega√ß√£o (Bolinhas)
    for(int i=0; i 3000) { fetchData(); lastUpdate = millis(); }

    if (digitalRead(BUTTON_BOOT) == LOW) {
        currentScreen = (currentScreen + 1) % totalScreens;
        delay(250);
    }
    drawUI();
}
